text: Werner De Spoelberch (24 January 1902 - 10 September 1987) was a Belgian alpine skier. He competed in the men's combined event at the 1936 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1902 births Category:1987 deaths Category:Belgian male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Belgium Category:Alpine skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Brussels
title: Werner De Spoelberch
